Here’s a weirdly padded table, which start compact.

|foooo |foooo| fooo |foooo|
|------|:----|:----:|----:|
|bar   |baz  | bar  |  bar|

|bar   |baz  | bar  |  bar|
|------|:----|:----:|----:|
|foooo |foooo| fooo |foooo|

Here’s a weirdly padded table, which start padded.

| foooo |foooo| fooo |foooo|
| ----- |:----|:----:|----:|
| bar   |baz  | bar  |  bar|

| bar   |baz  | bar  |  bar|
| ----- |:----|:----:|----:|
| foooo |foooo| fooo |foooo|
